channel.title: Github on Alex K Gold Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Alex K Gold Blog

item.title: Wedding?
item.description: If you know me personally, you know that aside from being a huge data nerd, I am totally crazy about my fiancee, Shoshana. Thus I’m SO happy that I get to build a wedding website for us from scratch. In order to not have to learn a totally new technology, I set it up as a github project page with a custom URL. A couple of interesting things I’ve learned: * When you’re setting up a website via github pages with a project page, it’s still really easy!
